bi þamma auk tawidedun praufetum attans ize.
LUKE 6.24 aþþan wai izwis þaim gabeigam, unte ju habaid gaþlaiht izwara.
LUKE 6.25 wai izwis, jus sadans nu, unte gredagai wairþiþ;
wai izwis, jus hlahjandans nu, unte gaunon jah gretan duginnid.
LUKE 6.26 wai, þan waila izwis qiþand allai mans;
samaleiko allis tawidedun galiugapraufetum attans ize.
LUKE 6.27 akei izwis qiþa þaim hausjandam:
frijod þans hatandans izwis;
waila taujaid þaim fijandam izwis.
LUKE 6.28 þiuþjaiþ þans fraqiþandans izwis;
bidjaid fram þaim anamahtjandam izwis.
LUKE 6.29 þamma stautandin þuk bi kinnu, galewei imma jah anþara;
jah þamma nimandin af þus wastja, jah paida ni warjais.
LUKE 6.30 ƕammeh þan bidjandane þuk gif jah af þamma nimandin þein ni lausei.
LUKE 6.31 jah swaswe wileid ei taujaina izwis mans, jah jus taujaid im samaleiko.
LUKE 6.32 aþþan jabai frijod þans frijondans izwis, ƕa izwis laune ist?
jah auk þai frawaurhtans þans frijondans sik frijond.
LUKE 6.33 jah jabai þiuþ taujaid þaim þiuþ taujandam izwis, ƕa izwis laune ist?
jah auk þai frawaurhtans þata samo taujand.
LUKE 6.34 jah jabai leiƕid fram þaimei weneid andniman, ƕa izwis laune ist?
jah auk frauwaurhtai frawaurhtaim leiƕand, ei andnimaina samalaud.

LUKE 6.35 sweþauh frijod þans fijands izwarans, þiuþ taujaid jah leiƕaid ni waihtais uswenans, jah wairþiþ mizdo izwara managa, jah wairþiþ sunjus hauhistins, unte is gods ist þaim unfagram jah unseljam.
LUKE 6.36 wairþaid bleiþjandans, swaswe jah atta izwar bleiþs ist.
LUKE 6.37 jah ni stojid, ei ni stojaindau;
ni afdomjaid, jah ni afdomjanda;
fraletaid, jah fraletanda.
LUKE 6.38 gibaid, jah gibada izwis,
mitads goda jah ufarfulla jah gawigana jah ufargutana gibada in barm izwarana;
þizai auk samon mitadjon þizaiei mitid mitada izwis.
LUKE 6.39 qaþuh þan gajukon im:
ibai mag blinds blindana tiuhan?
niu bai in dal gadriusand?
LUKE 6.40 nist siponeis ufar laisari seinana;
iþ gamanwids ƕarjizuh wairþai swe laisaris is.
LUKE 6.41 aþþan ƕa gaumeis gramsta in augin broþrs þeinis, iþ anza in þeinamma augin ni gaumeis?
LUKE 6.42 aiþþau ƕaiwa magt qiþan du broþr þeinamma: broþar let, ik uswairpa gramsta þamma in augin þeinamma, silba in augin þeinamma anza ni gaumjands?
liuta, uswairp faurþis þamma anza us augin þeinamma, jah þan gaumjais uswairpan gramsta þamma in augin broþrs þeinis.
LUKE 6.43 ni auk ist bagms gods taujands akran ubil, nih þan bagms ubils taujands akran god.
LUKE 6.44 ƕarjizuh raihtis bagme us swesamma akrana uskunþs ist;
ni auk us þaurnum lisand smakkans, nih þan us aiƕatundjai trudand weinabasja.
LUKE 6.45 þiuþeigs manna us þiuþeigamma huzda hairtins seinis usbairid þiuþ, jah ubils manna us ubilamma hairtins seinis usbairid ubil:
uzuh allis ufarfullein hairtins rodeid munþs is.
LUKE 6.46 aþþan ƕa mik haitid frauja, frauja! jah ni taujid þatei qiþa?
LUKE 6.47 ƕazuh sa gaggands du mis jah hausjands waurda meina jah taujands þo, ataugja izwis ƕamma galeiks ist.
LUKE 6.48 galeiks ist mann timrjandin razn, saei grob jah gadiupida jah gasatida grunduwaddjau ana staina.
at garunjon þan waurþanai bistagq aƕa bi jainamma razna jah ni mahta gawagjan ita;
gasulid auk was ana þamma staina.
LUKE 6.49 iþ sa hausjands jah ni taujands galeiks ist mann timrjandin razn ana airþai inuh grunduwaddju, þatei bistagq flodus,
jah suns gadraus,
jah warþ so uswalteins þis raznis mikila.
LUKE 7.1 Biþe þan usfullida alla þo waurda seina in hliumans manageins, galaiþ in Kafarnaum.
LUKE 7.2 hundafade þan sumis skalks siukands swultawairþja was, saei was imma swers.
LUKE 7.3 gahausjands þan bi Iesu insandida du imma sinistans Iudaie, bidjands ina ei qimi jah ganasidedi þana skalk is.
LUKE 7.4 iþ eis qimandans at Iesua bedun ina usdaudo, qiþandans þatei
